title: Classroom Setup Wizard
name: Classroom Setup Wizard
story: As an educator, I want to create a classroom with courses and invite students via a join link
description: Multi-step wizard for creating a classroom (cohort) with name, learning focus, courses, and invite link generation

triggers.given: An educator initiates the classroom creation workflow
triggers.then: The wizard steps are loaded from this spec and the flow progresses through all steps
triggers.name: Classroom Setup Wizard Execution

parameters.name: Wizard Step Definitions
parameters.description: Defines the sequence and configuration of classroom setup wizard steps

steps.label: Name & Focus
steps.description: Enter classroom name, optional description, and select learning domain

steps.label: Courses
steps.description: Select which courses (playbooks) to include in this classroom

steps.label: Invite
steps.description: Copy join link and invite message to share with students
